AT.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
AT.description: Zwei der beliebtesten – und haarigsten - Videospiel-Charaktere des Planeten feiern ihr Comeback: Donkey Kong und Diddy Kong machen wieder mal den Dschungel unsicher und lassen alle Nintendo-Fans jubeln – in dem wilden Jump’n’Run Donkey Kong Country Returns von Nintendo. Zum ersten Mal in dieser Kultspiel-Serie können die beiden populären Primaten ihre Gegner gemeinsam durchs Unterholz scheuchen. Dafür sorgt ein neuer, witziger Zwei-Spieler-Modus. Donkey Kong Country Returns bietet klassisches 2D-Jump’n’Run, für das diese Serie so bekannt und beliebt ist. Dazu kommen aber komplett neu gestaltete Spielebenen, spektakuläre Grafiken und – was dem Gameplay mehr Tiefe denn je verleiht – komplett dreidimensional animierte Welten. All das wird Kenner der Spielserie wie Neueinsteiger gleichermaßen begeistern. Das Abenteuer hat sich Nintendo in Zusammenarbeit mit Retro Studios ausgedacht. Es versetzt die Spieler und das Primaten-Duo mitten hinein in eine wilde Jagd über Traumstrände, durch Urwälder und Ruinenlandschaften. Dabei gilt es, Donkey Kongs kostbare Bananenvorräte vor wahren Horden diebischer Gegner zu bewahren.

AU.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
AU.description: Two of the best-loved – and certainly the hairiest – video game characters on the planet are set to make a roaring return in Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. And, for the first time ever in the series, the primate pals can now face their foes side-by-side, courtesy of a new two-player mode. Donkey Kong Country Returns offers the popular side-scrolling experience the series is known for, together with new levels, spectacular graphics and added depth to gameplay, courtesy of fully 3D environments – all of which are sure to delight both fans and series newcomers alike. In this instalment from Nintendo, in association with Retro Studios, you’ll find yourself immersed in dynamic duo, Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong’s, quest across jungle, beach and ruins to rescue Donkey Kong’s precious banana hoard from an array of enemies.

BG.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
BG.description: Two of the best-loved – and certainly the hairiest – video game characters on the planet are set to make a roaring return in Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. In this instalment from Nintendo, in association with Retro Studios, you’ll find yourself immersed in dynamic duo, Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong’s, quest across jungle, beach and ruins to rescue Donkey Kong’s precious banana hoard from an array of enemies.

BE.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
BE.description: Deux des personnages de jeu vidéo les plus aimés et aussi les plus poilus de la planète font leur grand retour dans Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. Et pour la première fois dans l'histoire de la série, les deux primates peuvent maintenant affronter leurs ennemis côte à côte grâce au nouveau mode pour deux joueurs. Donkey Kong™ Country Returns vous propose de retrouver les décors à défilement latéral qui ont fait le succès de la série, avec de nouveaux niveaux, des graphismes spectaculaires et une densité de jeu revue à la hausse grâce à des décors en 3D qui raviront aussi bien les nouveaux venus que les fans de toujours. Signé Nintendo, en association avec Retro Studios, ce opus vous plongera au cœur d'une aventure à travers jungles, plages et autres ruines antiques menée magistralement par l'intrépide duo composé de Donkey Kong et Diddy Kong qui cherchent à sauver le précieux stock de bananes de Donkey Kong des griffes d'une multitude d'ennemis.

ES.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
ES.description: Dos de los más queridos (y sin duda más peludos) personajes de la historia de los videojuegos preparan un regreso a lo grande en Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. Ahora, por vez primera en la serie, estos icónicos primates pueden enfrentarse juntos a sus enemigos, gracias al nuevo modo para dos jugadores. Donkey Kong Country Returns presenta una experiencia de scrolling lateral, a la manera típica de la serie, pero con nuevos niveles, gráficos de cortar la respiración y una mayor profundidad de juego gracias a los ambientes en 3D, que harán las delicias tanto de los novatos como de los auténticos fans de la serie. En la aventura de la serie de Nintendo, creada en colaboración con Retro Studios, te sumergirás en una aventura para dos con Donkey Kong y Diddy Kong y deambularás por una selva, una playa o unas ruinas para recuperar el preciado montón de plátanos de Donkey Kong de las manos enemigas.

IT.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
IT.description: Due dei personaggi più amati - e certamente più pelosi – del mondo dei videogiochi sono pronti a fare il loro rientro strepitoso con Donkey Kong Country Returns. E, per la prima volta nella serie, i due simpatici primati potranno affrontare i loro nemici, fianco a fianco, grazie alla nuova modalità a due giocatori. Donkey Kong Country Returns offre oltre alla famosa esperienza di gioco a scorrimento laterale della serie, anche nuovi livelli, una grafica sensazionale ed una maggiore profondità di gioco, grazie agli ambienti interamente tridimensionali, che delizieranno in egual misura sia i fan che i neofiti della serie. In questa avventura di Nintendo, in collaborazione con Retro Studios, sarà possibile rivestire i panni della dinamica coppia Donkey Kong e Diddy Kong, in una ricerca attraverso giungle, spiagge e rovine per salvare il prezioso bottino di banane di Donkey Kong da un'orda di nemici.

In this instalment from Nintendo, in association with Retro Studios, you’ll find yourself immersed in dynamic duo, Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong’s, quest across jungle, beach and ruins to rescue Donkey Kong’s precious banana hoard from an array of enemies.

NL.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
NL.description: Twee van de beroemdste – en harigste – videospelhelden ter wereld beleven een knallende comeback in Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. Voor het eerst kunnen twee spelers nu ook tegelijk aan de slag met Donkey Kong en Diddy Kong. Spelers kunnen genieten van de zijwaarts scrollende platformactie waar de serie bekend om staat. Het spel is uitgerust met nieuwe levels en spectaculaire graphics, terwijl de gameplay nieuwe diepte krijgt door optimaal gebruik van wondermooie 3D-omgevingen. Zowel oude fans als nieuwe spelers zullen direct worden gegrepen door de swingende actie! Dit deel in de serie is het resultaat van een nauwe samenwerking tussen Nintendo en Retro Studios. Spelers volgen met Donkey Kong™ en Diddy Kong™ een spoor van bananen door jungles, strandgebieden en tempelruïnes om de dierbare bananenvoorraad van Donkey Kong te redden van zijn vele beestachtige vijanden.

NZ.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
NZ.description: Two of the best-loved – and certainly the hairiest – video game characters on the planet are set to make a roaring return in Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. And, for the first time ever in the series, the primate pals can now face their foes side-by-side, courtesy of a new two-player mode. Donkey Kong Country Returns offers the popular side-scrolling experience the series is known for, together with new levels, spectacular graphics and added depth to gameplay, courtesy of fully 3D environments – all of which are sure to delight both fans and series newcomers alike. In this instalment from Nintendo, in association with Retro Studios, you’ll find yourself immersed in dynamic duo, Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong’s, quest across jungle, beach and ruins to rescue Donkey Kong’s precious banana hoard from an array of enemies.

PL.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
PL.description: Two of the best-loved – and certainly the hairiest – video game characters on the planet are set to make a roaring return in Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. And, for the first time ever in the series, the primate pals can now face their foes side-by-side, courtesy of a new two-player mode. Donkey Kong Country Returns offers the popular side-scrolling experience the series is known for, together with new levels, spectacular graphics and added depth to gameplay, courtesy of fully 3D environments – all of which are sure to delight both fans and series newcomers alike. In this instalment from Nintendo, in association with Retro Studios, you’ll find yourself immersed in dynamic duo, Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong’s, quest across jungle, beach and ruins to rescue Donkey Kong’s precious banana hoard from an array of enemies.

PT.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
PT.description: Duas das mais queridas (e peludas!) personagens da história dos videojogos preparam-se para um regresso que te promete deixar completamente abananado! E, pela primeira vez na série, os icónicos primatas de Donkey Kong poderão enfrentar os seus adversários lado a lado, cortesia do novo modo para dois jogadores. Donkey Kong Country Returns oferece a experiência de scrolling lateral a que a série já nos habituou mas apresenta agora novos níveis, gráficos de cortar a respiração e maior profundidade graças aos ambientes em 3D que irão, com certeza, fazer as delícias tanto de fãs como de novatos. Nesta aventura da série, criada em colaboração com a Retro Studios, darás por ti imerso numa aventura a dois, com Donkey Kong™ e Diddy Kong™ a atravessarem ambientes como a selva, a praia ou ruínas para resgatar dos inimigos o precioso stock de bananas de Donkey Kong.

RU.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
RU.description: Два самых любимых и уж, наверняка, самых волосатых героя из игр на планете, порадуют вас своим шумным возвращением в игре Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. Впервые в истории этой серии приятели примата могут сразиться со своими противниками бок о бок благодаря новому режиму, позволяющему играть вдвоем. Игра Donkey Kong Country Returns это те же любимые вами привычные приключения с приемом «колесо», дополненные новыми уровнями, эффектной графикой и углубленным геймплеем, трехмерной средой. Все это несомненно восхитит и фанатов и новичков серии игр. Эта новейшая разработка Nintendo в сотрудничестве с Retro Studios погрузит вас в мир динамичных приключений дуэта героев - Donkey Kong и Diddy Kong. Вам предстоит выполнить квест, пройдя джунгли, пляжи и развалины, и вернуть драгоценнейший запас бананов, отвоевав его у противника.

SE.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns
SE.description: Two of the best-loved – and certainly the hairiest – video game characters on the planet are set to make a roaring return in Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. And, for the first time ever in the series, the primate pals can now face their foes side-by-side, courtesy of a new two-player mode. Donkey Kong Country Returns offers the popular side-scrolling experience the series is known for, together with new levels, spectacular graphics and added depth to gameplay, courtesy of fully 3D environments – all of which are sure to delight both fans and series newcomers alike. SI.description: Two of the best-loved – and certainly the hairiest – video game characters on the planet are set to make a roaring return in Donkey Kong™ Country Returns. And, for the first time ever in the series, the primate pals can now face their foes side-by-side, courtesy of a new two-player mode. Donkey Kong Country Returns offers the popular side-scrolling experience the series is known for, together with new levels, spectacular graphics and added depth to gameplay, courtesy of fully 3D environments – all of which are sure to delight both fans and series newcomers alike. In this instalment from Nintendo, in association with Retro Studios, you’ll find yourself immersed in dynamic duo, Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong’s, quest across jungle, beach and ruins to rescue Donkey Kong’s precious banana hoard from an array of enemies.
